fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Raindance (Day): Summon a storm at night. Only Unseen will be told of this. Players that visit will be drenched in water. You will be told all of the players who are not drenched the following day. 3 uses.
-Thunderstorm (Night): Strike someone's house with a bolt of lightning. They will be roleblocked. Players without defense will be turned away from visiting, and you will know who isn't. 2 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: Thunderstorm will not roleblock if Everfrost is in the game.
